name: Diamond Pete
overview: 10 Lives * 10 Levels * 10 Screens Per Level. A frantic race against time as fortune hunting Diamond Pete searches the mine for the hidden diamonds. A massive haul of treasure lies at the end of his quest with 16 diamonds somewhere embedded in each of the screens, but time is not on Pete's side, he must act fast to clear each screen otherwise he'll find a life can be quickly lost. Diamond Pete is a puzzle game in the style of Boulder Dash meet Sokoban.
